name: Windows Application Packaging Project File
summary: A WAPPROJ file is a Windows Application Packaging Project file created by Microsoft Visual Studio, a software development tool used to create Windows apps. The file contains references to graphical assets (tile icons), application metadata, libraries, and programs used for running an application. It is used to generate an .APPXUPLOAD file, which can be submitted to the Microsoft Store for distribution to users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
